title: Game of Genes: How we saved the world from a bunch of fallen angels
description: How we saved the world from a bunch of fallen angels.With a little help from an Asian butler, some seriously cool multi-player computer games and a little (well a lot) of help from a thing called the Philosophers’ Guild. It’s up to you if you want to believe the rest. But just bear in mind: we become what we believe.
author: Clare Blanchard
